name: Adil Khoram
story: Habib Jawadi grew up in a small village in Iran. His father was a farmer and his mother was a schoolteacher. Habib joined the military at a young age and quickly excelled in marksmanship, earning the rank of Sergeant. He is married with three children whom he loves deeply. Habib is a devout Muslim and follows his religious teachings closely. He is disciplined, loyal, and follows orders without hesitation.
